title: BONUS: A Look at Match’s Singles in America Study 2021
description:
Every year, Match’s Singles in America study shows how the latest trends are shaping what it means to fly solo.

In this bonus episode, the Agape Match team gives their analysis on this year’s study. 

In the study, Match revealed that singles are redefining the new sexy. Spoiler alert: Physical attraction is no longer enough. From social movements to self-improvement, the study dives deep to see how emotional maturity has become the new “it” factor.

Read the study at https://www.singlesinamerica.com/

Want to join an upcoming Agape Intensive? 2022 dates just announced! http://agapeintensive.com

Follow Maria on Instagram to find out when the Matchmaker Hotline will be open to talk! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
